name: ISO/IEC 8211:1994, Information technology - Specification for a data descriptive file for information interchange.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">ddf</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: A media-independent interchange format to facilitate the moving of files or parts of files containing data records between computer systems.
